create table if not exists dh_patient ( id bigint not null generated by default as identity (start with 1) constraint pk_patient primary key, created_by varchar(255), created_date timestamp, last_modified_date timestamp, last_modified_by varchar(255), deleted boolean default false, version numeric default 0 not null, user_id bigint not null, newsletter boolean default false, name varchar(500), surname varchar(500), email varchar(500), phone varchar(20) );
ALTER TABLE dh_patient ADD CONSTRAINT fk_patient_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES dhsecurity.app_user(id);
